action.action-desc: Mr. Perry (for himself, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Tiffany, and Mr. Cawthorn) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to prohibit the use of the authorities under title I and title III of such Act for electric vehicles or related technologies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bullets Not Batteries Act.

section.header: Prohibition on the use of authorities for electric vehicles and related technology
section.text: Section 104 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 (50 U.S.C. 4514) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The authorities provided under this title and title III may not be used with respect toâ€”

paragraph.text: electric vehicle charging stations or other electric vehicle infrastructure; or
obtaining critical minerals that will be used for the manufacturing of any item described under paragraph (1), (2), or (3).
